SEARCH
Package view

Class SimulatorGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.SimulatorGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISimulatorUI
public class SimulatorGUI extends javafx.application.Application implements ISimulatorUI
Main graphical user interface for the simulator. Provides an interactive interface to control and visualize the simulation process.

  • Nested Class Summary
